structure.summary: This partial document provides a technical data profile for the Xiaonanhai Reservoir, detailing its classification, location on the Anyang River, and structural specifications including dam elevations and spillway characteristics. It covers essential hydrological parameters such as operational water levels (dead, flood limit, design, and check flood levels), storage capacities (total, flood control, and dead storage), and discharge capabilities for the spillway and water conveyance tunnel.

structure.summary: This partial document provides a detailed technical profile of Pipasi Reservoir (琵琶寺水库). It covers basic identification information such as the reservoir's code, its classification as a medium-sized facility, and its location on the Tangyong River. Key technical data points include structural elevations (dam top, spillway, and tunnels), dimensions and discharge capacities for flood and water conveyance structures, and critical water level metrics (dead, flood limit, design, and check flood levels). Additionally, it details storage capacity figures—including total, flood control, and dead storage—and notes the absence of specific data regarding certain tunnels and power station information.

structure.summary: The document provides a technical profile of the Gongshang Reservoir, a medium-sized reservoir located on the Xi River. It details key specifications across several categories: basic identification and geographical data (reservoir code and basin area), structural elevations and dimensions (dam crest, spillway, flood discharge tunnel, and water conveyance tunnel), hydraulic performance (design and maximum discharge rates), hydropower station parameters (installed capacity and diversion flow), and comprehensive water level and storage capacity metrics (including total, flood control, and benefit capacities).

structure.summary: This document provides a detailed technical profile of the Shimen Reservoir in Huixian, outlining its classification, geographical location, and structural specifications. Key information includes the reservoir's dam and spillway dimensions, discharge capacities, and gate configurations, as well as parameters for its water delivery tunnels and hydroelectric power station. Additionally, it lists critical operational data such as various water level benchmarks (dead, flood limit, and design flood levels) and specific storage capacities (total, flood control, and dead storage).

Key points covered include general information (reservoir type, location on the Zhifanggou River, and watershed area), structural parameters (elevations of the dam, spillway, and tunnels), and detailed metrics for the spillway and discharge systems (gate numbers, dimensions, and flow capacities). Additionally, it outlines the operational characteristics of the associated power station and lists critical hydrological water levels and various reservoir storage capacities (including total, flood control, and active storage).
